about_the_game:
This is the soundtrack for Pedro's Adventures in Spanish. Written and performed by the game's designer Chaz Lewis.

Purchasing this soundtrack is a very effective way to support the development of this game and future games like it. From the bottom of our hearts we thank you.

Rocket Boy Games is a small two person indie studio based in Canberra, Australia. Our goal is to create fun alternatives to your language learning experience.
